summary: "Spider-Man 3" is a 2007 superhero movie about Spider-Man, played by Tobey Maguire. It's the last in a trilogy directed by Sam Raimi. The story happens a year after the second movie, with Peter Parker facing new challenges. He meets old enemies like Harry Osborn and a new one, Sandman. Peter also gets a powerful but dangerous alien suit. The film had a big budget and made lots of money, but critics had mixed feelings about it. After this, the series was rebooted with new actors and directors.
title: Spider-Man 3
